mapper.select: select id,typeName from (select id,typeName from hubble.test.booktypes where id between #{currIndex} and #{pageSize}) tt order by id
mapper.insert:

( #{bs.busi_guid}, #{bs.create_date}, #{bs.seri_no}, #{bs.reve_seri_no}, #{bs.dt_busi}, #{bs.tf_flag}, #{bs.error_code}, #{bs.note_vers}, #{bs.face_value}, #{bs.posi_offs}, #{bs.sequ_no}, #{bs.fsn_path}, #{bs.fsn_no}, #{bs.file_type}, #{bs.note_curr}, #{bs.busi_type}, #{bs.finan_ins}, #{bs.mach_no}, #{bs.manu_code}, #{bs.mach_type}, #{bs.machine_model}, #{bs.hard_verno}, #{bs.authsoft_verno}, #{bs.commercial_code}, #{bs.bank_no}, #{bs.mach_oper_no} )
